Key Match Events: The game went to a Super Over after both sides made 159 in their 20 overs.
Aaron Jones was run out for 11 in the Super Over, with seven runs coming via extras.
Iftikhar Ahmed was caught by Nitish Kumar close to the boundary, restricting Pakistan to 13 for one.
Post-Match Reflections: USA captain Monank Patel described the result as a ‘big achievement’.
Pakistan captain Babar Azam bemoaned his side’s batting performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first time that the ICC has staged a major tournament in the United States.
The USA had already turned heads ahead of the tournament by beating Bangladesh 2-1 in their warm-up series last month.
Others: The USA now have a great chance of making the Super 8s round.
The top two from the four groups progress to the last eight of the tournament.
The USA's next match is also against India, at the same New York venue, on Wednesday June 12 at 3.30pm.
